subject: Re: New Speakjet box is working.
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Cool Rob.  Right off the bat, I heard the word, "Ready."  :-)

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dead.science" <dead.science@...> wrote:
>
> Hello:
> I just finished my portable (field use) Speakjet box.  You can see it
> in my pictures and hear it in my audio files.  Both are under Dead
> Science.
> I have to say this thing is very neat!  It really does take EMF and
> produce words.  I will do sessions with it and post.  If you need any
> information on the box please feel free to email me or just wait for
> my next Podcast at www.deadscience.com and I will talk all about it.
> Rob.
>
